graveyard: ^I know I loved him. I would have loved him all my life, if I could have.
in_the_kitchens: ^In bad hands, things go badly. It's that simple.
hotel_bathroom: ^I think that's why Ernst died. Someone... gave him... something.
back_alleyway: ^My husband wasn't perfect. Just another poor unfortunate who got in the way.
kingdiamondsclub: ^Because someone tried to change things. To turn them to their own advantage. Only the house always wins.
apartment: ^I told him not to go. But he wouldn't listen. He said this time it would be different.
quentin_passes_note: ^Not every opportunity is worth taking, however well paid.
item_from_quentin: ^But it's hard to tell friends from enemies, sometimes.
wedding_drive_away: ^I had never been so happy as the day we got married.

b: ^"Don't even think about giving it to him."
^"If you're out of chips, sir, you cannot bet."
^"Operation of device observed from California earthquake monitoring station, Oct '62"
^"Found amongst possessions of ER, murder victim."
^"Aug 15th, 1964. Device is removed from protective sheath."
^"Whatever it is, you can trust me, sir."
^"Attempted theft. Killer was disturbed and escaped. Narcotics in victim's blood."
^"KING OF DIAMONDS: cards / slots / roulette / girls"
^"Quentin Perdi, Private Investigator. Champs de Mars. No matter too small. Divorce a speciality."
^"Gamblers Anonymous. DON'T GET LUCKY GET HELP."
^A few white grains are still visible on the spoon.
^Containing a few grains of a white powder.
^The back of this card is slightly different from the others.
^Parking receipt for a Blue Chevy, registered to Ernst Richards
^"Paris. May 1968. Device shell found on theft victim's corpse."
^"Ernie - Hold onto this for me. Keep it safe. Q."
^"Handover at the Champs du Mars. Midnight tonight. Q."
^"I'll get over to the UN right away, sir."
^"Yes? Do you have something for me?"
^"This is excellent cover. You have done very well, Ana. Do not worry. Your reward will come."
^"Well done, comrade. You have our thanks. We will extract you when it is safe."
^"You've made the right decision. I'm glad you've seen what's right here."
^"You are having second thoughts? You wish to be extracted?"
^Kitchens of the Hotel de la Tour
